StartRoom.Text: You're laying in bed. You're eyes are getting heavy, and just as they shut, you're wide awake. Standing in an open field, the only thing visible is a giant hole straight ahead.

EnemyRoom1.Text: You land in large body of water, splashing in fear, you realize you're not the ony one. something large grazes your leg, but the water is pitch black. Quickly you realize there's more, you've landed in shark infested waters!

EmptyRoom2.Text: Flying out of the water, up through the hole you fell through, but the field is gone. Trapped in a tiny room with two doors, one directly in front of you, the other to your backside

Action1: Walk through the door in front of you.
Action2: Walk through the door behind you
Action3: Dry off and wait in this room.

EmptyRoom2-2.Text: As you take a break to dry off, you feel a sudden breeze but don't know where its coming from. As you look up, you're staring into the funnel of a tornado. Quickly being taken off your feet spinning, with no end in sight

EnemyRoom2.Text: After getting thrown out of the tornado, you land safely in forest, the trees softening the blow. You here rustling from two directions, and before you know it a bear and a wolf surround you.

PuzzleRoom1.Text:
The new room looks harmless, but no way out. At least you're safe, for now...

In front of you sits some sort of puzzle. It looks important.

PuzzleRoom2.Text: you start to feel the ground shake and as you feel the wall be behind you touch you back, you realize that the room is getting smaller. with no way out, you realize the puzzle is the only chance of survival.

LastRoom.Text: Just before the walls reach the width of your shoulders, you complete the puzzle. They begin to retract and a glowing door appears in front of you.

EndLose.Text: Waking up in bed you realize you gave up for no reason. Failure.

EndWin.Text: Waking up in bed you realize you did it, you can survive anything. Later that day you win 1 million dollars nice job.
